title: Alice in Performanceland -- Down the Rabbit Hole with Frank Wiles
description:
While pre-optimization is often the root of all evil, knowing how to
think about performance and scalability are important skills for any
geek. Learn about all the knobs you didn't know you could or should
tweak.

Abstract

Code profiling and dealing with your database aren't the only places to
find performance gains. Performance and scalability are holistic
endeavors.
